attributes.action: Stop "Citizen Khan" on the BBC from making a mockery of Islam and other sensitive issues which affect community cohesion.
attributes.additional_details:
We hereby call upon the government to ban the airing of this offensive, racist and morally degenerative series which makes a mockery of Islam and also the Pakistani culture.

Community cohesion is being affected and one of the biggest religions in the world is being openly mocked - leading to outrage and potential retaliation from the Muslim community.

The series is inflammatory and is counter-productive to community cohesion, inclusion and integration.

The series should be taken off the air and should also be removed from all online outlets.
